Michele Bachmann : Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia addressed a group of lawmakers at a gathering sponsored by the Tea Party Caucus, organized by Mike Pence Michele Bachmann , href="http://bloom.bg/gJWDR1"> Bloomberg reports. Antonin Scalia 's speech was the first in a series of seminars the Tea Party Caucus plans to hold twice a month to refresh members on` basic principles,' said Doug Sachtleben, a spokesman for Michele Bachmann . the revolt. Zahi Hawass , minister of state for antiquities, said a statue of boy king Tutankhamun and several other ancient treasures had been stolen from the museum. The missing objects include a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty king Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess and parts of another statue showing him harpooning, he said.
